Detailed Description

The class CacheManager often use to store cookies.

It handles request of cookies by URL, remove expired cookies, transform cookie information to text and transform these text back. 

  CookieManager *cm = CookieManager::createDefaultCookieManager();

Definition at line 25 of file CookieManager.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::net::CookieManager::CookieManager ( CookieManager::IStore *  store) [explicit]

Construct a CookieManager with a storage backend.

Parameters:
storeStore backend of cookie. NULL if backend is not presented, in-memory cookie store will still in use.

Member Function Documentation

static CookieManager* gaia::net::CookieManager::createDefaultCookieManager ( ) [static]

Create a cookie manager with default setting.

The cookie manager created here uses in-memory storage.

Returns:
CookieManager with in-memory storage, without any previous data. Call should delete the instance after usage.
